message: Found 1 absolute http references: [(('servers', 0, 'url'), 'url', 'https://api.godaddy.com')]

root-spec repaired: {"values_changed": {"root['info']['description']": {"new_value": "API for managing domain names including domain availability checks, registration, renewal, transfer, and management operations. Provides endpoints for domain purchase, contact management, DNS configuration, and legal agreement retrieval.", "old_value": "

The Domains API is for domain-related actions such as purchasing, renewing, or managing domains.

Updates to domains generally require the domain to be in an `ACTIVE` status. Some update actions (such as updating nameservers) on protected and high-value domains requires 2FA which is currently not supported via the api.

"}, "root['info']['title']": {"new_value": "GoDaddy Domains API", "old_value": "Domains API"}, "root['info']['version']": {"new_value": "1.0.0", "old_value": ""}}}

bundled-spec repaired: {"values_changed": {"root['info']['description']": {"new_value": "API for managing domain registrations, transfers, renewals, and related services including domain availability checks, legal agreements, contacts management, and DNS configuration.", "old_value": "

The Domains API is for domain-related actions such as purchasing, renewing, or managing domains.

Updates to domains generally require the domain to be in an `ACTIVE` status. Some update actions (such as updating nameservers) on protected and high-value domains requires 2FA which is currently not supported via the api.

"}, "root['info']['title']": {"new_value": "GoDaddy Domains API", "old_value": "Domains API"}, "root['info']['version']": {"new_value": "1.0.0", "old_value": ""}}}
